column4: I have a few questions, I just bought a Netbook for my C/Unix programming class because i need my normal laptop for my Algo class. Anyway i would like to know.  Should i install Ubuntu 9.10 or Kubuntu 9.10. The netbook has a Atom N280 and 2gb of Ram. Which one would perform better?
they will both perform similar, but Ubuntu has a netbook specific release called Ubuntu Netbook Remix that will work well
if you want better performance than KDE or Gnome go with Xubuntu. It runs great. I use it and am very impressed
Xubuntu will do great for that
